name: Boston Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker, and dry shake for 15-30 seconds. Add ice to shaker and shake for another 15 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coup glass. Express lemon twist overtop of cocktail, and garnish with 3 drops for bitters

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with ice, and shake for 15-30 seconds.  Strain into a double rocks glass over ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry

name: Old-Fashioned
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a double rocks glass over ice. Express orange and lemon twist over the cocktail, then add each into the cocktail.

name: Vermouth Cocktail
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a chilled coupe. Express the lemon twist over the cocktail, and set it on the edge of glass.

name: Ti' Punch
instructions: Muddle lime coin with cane syrup in a double rocks glass.  Add the rum and fill the glass with ice. Stir the cocktail and serve.

name: Fancy Free
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a double rocks glass over ice. Express the orange twist over the cocktail, then add it into the cocktail.

name: Monte Carlo
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a double rocks glass over ice. Express the lemon twist over the cocktail, then add it into the cocktail.

name: Chrysanthemum
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a chilled coupe. Express the orange twist over the cocktail, then add it into the cocktail.

name: Stinger
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker, and shake for 5-10 seconds, strain into an rocks glass filled with pebbled ice. Garnish with mint.

name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Express the lemon twist over the cocktail, then add it into the cocktail.

name: Champagne Cocktail
instructions: Saturate the sugar cube in bitters and drop it in a chilled champagne flute. Slowly fill flute with champagne. Express the lemon twist over the cocktail, then add it into the drink.

name: Mint Julep
instructions: Add mint to a mixing glass and lightly muddle.  Add rest of  ingredients into the mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Double strain into a chilled Julep glass half filled with crushed ice, then top off and cone with more crushed ice. Garnish with mint and serve with a straw.

name: Earl Grey Tea Infused Gin
instructions: Mix Gin and tea and let it infuse for about 2 hours. Strain the tea leaves and store gin.

name: MarTEAni
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker, and dry shake for 15-30 seconds. Add ice to shaker and shake for another 15 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coup glass. Express lemon twist overtop of cocktail, and discard twist

name: Aku Aku
instructions: Add mint to shaker and lightly muddle, then add all other ingredients into shaker with ice and shake for 15-20 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coup glass and garnish with mint.

name: Pupule
instructions: Add all other ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 15-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled pilsner glass, and top off ice to fill cup.  Garnish with orange and mint. Serve with a straw

name: Don's Own Grog
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 15-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled double rocks glass, and top off ice to fill cup.  Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg. Serve with a straw

name: Three Dots and A Dash
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 15-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled pilsner glass, and top off ice to fill cup.  Garnish with speared 3 cherries and pineapple chuck to represent the Morse code for victory, 3 dots and a dash. Serve with a straw

name: El Diablo
instructions: Add all ingredients except ginger beer into shaker with  ice and shake for 15-20 seconds.  Strain into a chilled collins glass over ice, and top off with ginger beer.  Garnish with lime.  Serve with a straw

name: Port Light
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker, and dry shake for 15-30 seconds. Add ice to shaker and shake for another 15 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled pilsner glass. Serve with a straw

name: Jet Pilot
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 15-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled double rocks glass, and top off ice to fill cup. Serve with a straw

name: Halekulani Cocktail
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with ice and  shake for 15-30 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coup glass. Garnish with orchid.

name: Sidewinder's Fang
instructions: Add orange peel to chilled brandy snifter, with one end if peel hanging out of glass, fill glass with ice.  Add all ingredients into shaker with ice and  shake for 15-30 seconds.  Double strain into prepared brandy snifter. Garnish with mint spring. Serve with a straw

name: Hawaiian Sunset
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with ice and shake for 15-30 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coup glass. Garnish with lime twist.

name: Captain's Grog
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled double rocks glass, top off with ice. Garnish with mint spring. Server with a straw

name: Suffering Bastard
instructions: Add ginger beer into a chilled Collins glass over ice. Add rest of ingredients into shaker with ice and shake for 15-20 seconds, strain over ginger beer in collins glass.  Garnish with mint.  Serve with a straw

name: Merciless Virgin
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled pilsner glass, top off with ice. Garnish with cherries on cocktail pick. Serve with a straw

name: Saturn
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled rocks glass and top off with ice. Wrap lemon peel around cherry, place onto cocktail pick and garnish. Serve with a straw

name: Tiki Bowl
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 15-30 seconds.  Dump into a tiki bowl. Garnish with orchids. Serves two

name: Hurricane
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled hurricane glass and top off with ice. Garnish with lemon and umbrella. Serve with a straw

name: Mundo Perdido
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with ice and shake for 15-30 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coups glass.

name: Formidable Dragon

ingredients.i8: 1/4oz Overproof Pot Still Lightly Aged Rum

instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled brandy snifter and top off with ice.  Garnish with orchid and mint. Serve with a straw.

name: Lei Lani Volcano 2.0
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled Collins glass with ice, top off with soda.  Garnish with orchid and serve with a straw.

name: Tradewinds
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled Collins glass and top off with ice.  Garnish with lemon wedge with umbrella turned inside out. Serve with a straw.

name: Peachtree Punch 2.0
instructions: Add juices and peaches to shacker and muddle, add all remaining ingredients except seltzer into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled double rocks glass over ice, top off with seltzer and stir.  Garnish with peach slice and fresh grated nutmeg. Serve with a straw.

name: Jungle Bird
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled Collins glass and top off with ice.  Garnish with pineapple fronds and serve with a straw.

name: Golden Gun
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled Collins glass over ice.

name: Hinky Dinks Fizzy
instructions: Pour wine into a chilled brandy snifter. Add all ingredients except wine into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds, dump into snifter over wine, and top off with ice. Garnish with mint spring, and serve with a straw.

name: Pampanito
instructions: Add all ingredients except seltzer into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds. Add seltzer to shacker then dump into a chilled Collins glass and top off with crushed ice.  Garnish with lemon twist and serve with a straw.

name: Max's Mistake
instructions: Add all ingredients except lemonade into shaker with crushed ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Add lemonade to shaker then dump into a chilled brandy snifter and top off with crushed ice.  Garnish with mint spring and serve with a straw.

name: La Guildive
instructions: Pour ginger beer into chilled coup. Add remaining ingredients into shaker with ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Double strain the shacker contents into the coup.  Garnish with lime twist.

name: Twenty Seventy Swizzle
instructions: Add all ingredients into chilled Collins glass add crushed ice leaving room to mix. Mix with swizzle stick until drink is chilled and top off with crushed ice. Garnish with mint spring and serve with a straw.

name: Shudders In A Whisper
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with crushed ice and shake for 15-20 seconds. Dump into a chilled brandy snifter and top off with crushed ice. Garnish with mint spring and orchid and serve with a straw.

name: Cuevas
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice and stir until cold. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Place cherry into center of drink.

name: Norwegian Paralysis
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds. Double strain into a chilled Collins glass over ice. Garnish with lemon wedge and umbrella and serve with a straw.

name: Juan Ho Royale
instructions: Pour sparkling wine into chilled coup. Add remaining ingredients into shaker with ice and shake for 10-20 seconds.  Double strain the shacker contents into the coup.

name: Chartreuse Swizzle
instructions: Add all ingredients into chilled Collins glass add crushed ice leaving room to mix. Mix with swizzle stick until drink is chilled and top off with crushed ice. Garnish with mint spring and freshly grated nutmeg and serve with a straw

name: Roselita
instructions: Add all ingredients except seltzer into shacker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Add seltzer into shacker and double strain into a chilled Collins glass over ice. Garnish with hibiscus flower and serve with a straw.

name: Hibiscus Liqueur
instructions: Add ginger, cloves, into rum and let sit for 24 hours.  Strain rum and add hibiscus to rum and let sit for 24 hours and strain, this can be used as a hibiscus infused rum.  Mix 2 1/2 cups of the hibiscus infusion with the honey and simple syrup until completely combined.

name: Center Of The Galaxy
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with lime and raspberry.

name: Callaloo Cooler
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Add seltzer into shacker and double strain into a chilled Collins glass over ice. Garnish with mint spring and grated cinnamon and serve with straw.

name: Top Notch Volcano
instructions: Add all ingredients into pitcher with ice and mix until.  Dump into a scorpion bowl. Add orange and lime wheels to bowl and serve with long straws.

name: The Naked Ape
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Dump into a tiki mug and top off with ice. Serve with a straw.

name: Sparkling Mai Tai
instructions: Add all ingredients except sparkling wine into shacker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coupe glass and top with sparkling wine. Garnish with mint spring and lime twist.

name: Swizzle Francais
instructions: Add all ingredients into chilled Collins glass add crushed ice leaving room to mix. Mix with swizzle stick until drink is chilled and top off with crushed ice. Garnish with mint spring and freshly grated nutmeg and serve with a straw.

name: The Ernesto
instructions: Add all ingredients except soda into shacker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds. Add soda into chilled double rocks glass over ice then double strain shacker contents overtop. Garnish with orchids and lime wheel and serve with a straw.

name: The Sexpert
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with orchids and lime wheel.

name: Hana Reviver
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds. Dump into a chilled pilsner glass and top off with ice. Garnish with mint.

name: Kaiteur Swizzle
instructions: Add all ingredients into chilled Collins glass add crushed ice leaving room to mix. Mix with swizzle stick until drink is chilled and top off with crushed ice. Garnish with mint spring and serve with a straw.

name: The Expedition
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Dump into a tiki mug and top off with ice. Garnish with orchids and serve with a straw.

name: The Dead Reckoning
instructions: Add all ingredients except seltzer into shacker with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Add seltzer into shaker and dump into a chilled Collins glass and top off with ice. Garnish and serve with a straw.

name: Vanilla Brandy
instructions: Slice vanilla bean length wise and add to brandy. Let it sit at room temp for 2 weeks.  After two weeks remove bean and add demerara syrup.

name: Falinum
instructions: Add all ingredients except seltzer into shacker with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Add seltzer into shaker and dump into a tiki mug and top off with ice and serve with a straw.

name: Humuhumunukunukuapua'a
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled double rocks glass and top off with ice. Garnish with orchid and cherry on cocktail pick and serve with a straw

name: Lauwiliwilinukunuku'oi'oi
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled double rocks glass and top off with ice. Garnish with orchid and cherry on cocktail pick and serve with a straw

name: Finkelgrog
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker except seltzer with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Add seltzer to shaker and dump into a chilled double rocks glass and top off with ice. Serve with a straw

name: For Pete's Sake
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled double rocks glass and top off with ice. Garnish with hibiscus and cherry and serve with a straw

name: Wine Syrup
instructions: Simmer wine in small saucepan until reduced by half. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Let cool and store in refrigerator in air tight bottle.

name: Arrack Punch
instructions: Carbonate chai tea with home soda maker.  Add all ingredients into pitcher with crushed ice and stir until cold.  Dump into a 32oz punch or tiki bowl. Add lemon and lime wheels

name: El Draque
instructions: Add mint into shacker and lightly muddle, and in remaining rest of ingredients with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

name: Grog
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled rocks glass over ice.

name: Rum Flip
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker and dry shake 10-15 second add ice and shack for another 15-20 seconds. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass over ice. Garnish with fresh grated nutmeg.

name: Bombo
instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over ice. Garnish with fresh grated nutmeg.

name: Calibogus
instructions: Add all ingredients except seltzer into shacker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Add seltzer into chilled Collins glass over ice and double strain shacker contents over top. Serve with a straw.

name: Port Au Prince
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker with crushed ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Dump into a chilled pilsner glass and top of with ice. Garnish with lime wedge and serve with a straw.

name: Mary Pickford
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds. Double strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds. Double strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Hotel Nacional Special
instructions: Muddle pineapple, lime and demerara syrup in shacker, add apricot liqueur, rum, and ice and shack for 15-20 seconds. Double strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Daisy De Santiago
instructions: Add all ingredients except seltzer into a shaker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Add seltzer to shacker then double strain into a chilled double rocks glass over crushed ice and top of with more ice. Garnish with mint spring and serve with a straw.

name: Twelve Mile Limit
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: El Presidente
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with ice and shack for 15-20 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Parisian Blonde
instructions: Add curacao and rum into mixing glass with ice and stir until cold. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Float sweet cream on top. Garnish with fresh grated cinnamon.

name: Sweet Cream
instructions: Blend cream and demerara syrup until slightly thickened.

name: Cora Middleton
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker and dry shake for 10-15 seconds, add ice and shake for 15-20 seconds. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a drop of Angostura bitters.

name: Millionaire Cocktail
instructions: Add all ingredients into shacker with ice and shake for 15-20 seconds. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with lime wheel.

name: Batida De Maracuja E Coco
instructions: Add all ingredients except condensed milk into shacker with crushed ice then add condensed milk and shake for 20-50 seconds. Dump into a chilled rocks glass and top off with more ice. Garnish with mint spring and serve with a straw.

name: Batida De Maracuja
instructions: Add all ingredients except condensed milk into shacker with crushed ice then add condensed milk and shake for 20-50 seconds. Dump into a chilled rocks glass and top off with more ice. Garnish with mint spring and serve with a straw.

name: Batida De Maracuja
instructions: Add all ingredients except condensed milk into shacker with crushed ice then add condensed milk and shake for 20-50 seconds. Dump into a chilled rocks glass and top off with more ice. Garnish with mint spring and serve with a straw.

name: Wray & Ting
instructions: Add rum into Collins glass over ice.  Top off with ting soda.  Squeeze lime into drink and add to cup.  Serve with a straw
